titleStmt.title: The art of memory so far forth as it dependeth vpon places and idea's[sic] Written first in Latine, by Iohn Willis Bachelour in Diuinitie: and now published in English by the said author, with such alternations thereof as seemed needful.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Iones, and are to be sold by Henry Seely in Pauls churchyard at the Tygres head,

notesStmt.note: An English translation, with revisions, of the third book of John Willis' Mnemonica, sive reminiscendi ars.
Running title reads: The art of memorie.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
